title: Opinion: I’m a designer. The new food pyramid is outdated and confusing
description: The new food pyramid represents “an outdated way of thinking about visual communication,” writes a designer.
content: The new food pyramid represents “an outdated way of thinking about visual communication,” writes a designer.
